testcase.name: TC11 kullanici gecerli bilgilerle giris yapar
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "brcUrl" ana sayfasinda.....................................passed Then Login yazisina tiklar..................................................passed And gecersiz username girer.................................................passed And kullanici 2 saniye bekler...............................................passed And gecersiz password girer.................................................passed And Login butonuna basar....................................................passed And kullanici 2 saniye bekler...............................................passed Then sayfaya giris yapilamadigini kontrol eder..............................passed And kullanici 2 saniye bekler...............................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
